Front Yard.description: A small yard with a driveway and a mailbox.

Living Room.description: A cozy living room filled with family photos and a TV.

Hall.description: A pretty average hall for a house this size.

Kitchen.description: A well-used kitchen with various appliances and a dining table.

Back Yard.description: A yard with a treehouse and a barbecue grill.

Master Bedroom.description: A bedroom with a large bed, and various personal belongings.

Kid's Room.description: A room full of toys, posters, and a skateboard.
